hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Uqbah bin 'Amir Al-Juhani said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Whoever performs Wudu' and does it well, then prays two Rak'ahs in which his heart and face are focused, Paradise will be his

chapter.ara-name: باب ثَوَابِ مَنْ أَحْسَنَ الْوُضُوءَ ثُمَّ صَلَّى رَكْعَتَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: The Reward For One Who Performs Wudu' Well Then Then Prays Two Rak'ahs
